title: Then Came The Fire
description: Personal accounts from the Pentagon, 11 September 2001. Thiscollection of oral histories highlights the personal accounts of over fifty such participants who witnessed some aspect of the events in the Pentagon that day: those wounded, the first responders, medical personnel, rescuers, those rescued, those who moved through the rubble for days afterwards hoping to find more alive, and building occupants who began picking up the pieces.
author: Stephen J. Lofgren
